TopicTitle: Questions and Topics suitable for this forum

Articles.Content:
If you have a modding question unrelated to Modelling, Texturing or Plugin Development, this is the subforum for you!

Suitable topics include:

  • PartModule parameters and configurations (both stock and mod)
  • Localization
  • ModuleManager patches
  • kOS autopilot scripts
  • Kopernicus planet configs
  • plus any other CFG-related issues!
Edited August 22, 2018 by sumghai
Added localization to list of suitable topics
